explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions applying a machine learning statistical technique called Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA).
explanations.unsupervised learning: Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) is an unsupervised learning technique used for topic modeling.
explanations.classification: The paper uses LDA to classify companies' risks reported on 10-k SEC Forms.
explanations.clustering: LDA is also a clustering technique that groups similar documents (or in this case, risks) together based on their content.
